column4: hey... i just did a fresh hardy install... but when i tried to install phpmyadmin and all its dependencies, it is not found ... i also noticed that mysqld fails to start because of a permissions issue ... i also found a post saying i should install mysqli, but thats not in the repos ... anyone know wtf is going on
do you want LAMP?  there is a way to install lampp directly
yes that is what I am after
